'''Polished andesite''' is the polished version of [[andesite]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Polished andesite can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, it drops nothing.

{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Polished Andesite|Pickaxe|Wood|link=none}}

=== Natural generation ===
One block of polished andesite can be found in [[igloo]] basements. Polished andesite can also be found in the "nature", "forge", and "large jail" rooms of [[woodland mansion]]s and also in [[trial chambers]] surrounding the supply [[chest]]s with [[chiseled tuff bricks]].

== Usage ==
Polished andesite is currently used only for decoration. It has the same [[Explosion#Blast resistance|blast resistance]] as [[stone]], meaning it can be used as a substitute for stone when building.

=== Note blocks ===
Polished andesite can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
